website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use pet tracking system that will give you good results when used within its limits.
pros: Device has a long battery life that will last a few weeks before needing recharging
Tracking tags can be used in water for dogs who like to swim
Device will give you an alert if the pet leaves the area you've designated as safe
cons: Doesn't have GPS tracking technology included, so it has a limited range of accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Not to big for a cat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve included a photo so you can see the sizing for a smaller cat. It works great. We’ve been using it for a few months. My cat doesn’t mind it at all and I have piece of mind when he goes outside.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Conomos

customer_reviews.title: Great option to keep your pet safe.  Afordable & easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to keep our dog safe. I couldn't afford a GPS unit & the units that work on cell signals weren't an option as cell service is very poor where we live, so this was a great option for me. The transmitter is not heavy for the dog to wear & it attaches around the dog's existing collar with velcro. I did end up ordering an extra transmitter holder from the company, because our dog got into a skunk & I decided it would be smart to have an extra on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Road2clova

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have a very expensive Bengal cat that like to go on walk about. At night the kids cannot sleep until they know he is home safe. This unit has led me right to him every time. He does not go far, but loves to hide. This gives me all sorts of confidence that a night will not go by with my children worried about their beloved cat. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B Young, Jr

customer_reviews.title: I am so thankful for this product because it helped me get my sweet boy back
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this tracker 5 stars! My dog ran away and we knew which direction he went but not exactly. After he was lost overnight during a rainstorm, we were able to pick him up on the tracker and traced him down in the middle of a cow pasture. I am so thankful for this product because it helped me get my sweet boy back! He has lost his roaming privileges, but happy to be home.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for accurate use.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months to review this. The product is great for superficial use. However at my parents farm, which is flat with some trees on it. This product is not accurate, doesn’t work for more than 1/5 mile. Also even when he goes behind a vehicle less than 100 yards away. It’s a great idea but the product isn’t reliable. I was very disappointed. I don’t feel comfortable trying to use this for my dogs protection.
customer_reviews.author: kris wiggins

customer_reviews.title: How it operates. Seriously, read the instructions. Battery in tag lasts longer if locator is n monitor mode.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about Marco Polo working on cats because of its size, but neither cat seems bothered by the tracking devise on their collars. It works very well and gives me piece of mind that I can most likely find the cats. It does a great job. Once the monitor said out of range and once the signal from the tag wasn’t received. I had the distance set at medium and have since set it to maximum. Haven’t had to look for cat since I changed it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Tracker!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to track one of our cats who likes to roam. We periodically check to see where he is and we have found him 100% of the time with this tracker.
customer_reviews.author: Gemjamgirl

customer_reviews.title: No other product like this in the market
customer_reviews.text: No other product like this in the market. BEST Feature is > 3 month battery life!!!! I challenge anyone to find one with this functionality and NO CELL service required. I use this for both my Drone and my Dog. I have 3 units. Works well
customer_reviews.author: FELIX

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It works like they say!
customer_reviews.text: Reliable. Helps me find my dog when he wanders around the 40 acres. Works just like they say and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a practical alternative to the cell tower based trackers.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hile

customer_reviews.title: Works where GPS units won’t.
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Rockies and cavorting with my Lab off-leash at 9,000 to 11,000 feet, it’s critical to follow her when she picks up a scent & heads out after it despite me raining treats after her (retriever owners have been there). Tried GPS trackers which require cell service and is non-existent at the forested elevations. The Marco Polo radio unit is the solution. Unfailingly works in these conditions. A bit expensive but what would one pay to recover a beloved pet?
customer_reviews.author: richard f jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Has its flaws, but great overall.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite feature is the ability to do a group search party. This unadvertised feature would be great for rescue groups or any other group that deals with flight risk dogs. Works great for what it is. I had to fumble around learning hot to "track" but once I got it down it makes sense. My cat however.... Must have thought it itched or something because she shredded the antenna out of the collar. The good news is, that because of the way it's made, the antenna stayed intact and the unit stayed in the collar. Would definitely recommend. Especially for rescue groups or fosters.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: No more hiding from me Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: I can now find my indoor/outdoor cat weather he likes it or not. Great product with good instructions and easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery so my dogs can wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: My stupid dogs are escape artists. We live on 13 acres of Vermont land, so when they see something interesting, there's no containing them. The signal leaves something to be desired in our wooded, hilly property. Once you get to a high spot with clear sight lines it picks them right up. It's like playing "hotter/colder" with an arrow that points in the vague direction of the signal.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: ... dog which is hard of hearing and this is perfect for us going off leash hinking
customer_reviews.text: i have a dog which is hard of hearing and this is perfect for us going off leash hiking. it is easy to use and you dont need cell or gps reception for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: snuk11

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but it doesn't come with the piece to attach the transmitter to your pets collar. I ordered this, returned it because I thought it was missing pieces, got another one sent, and it was the same way. Again, you are not getting what is in the picture, you will need to purchase the holder direct from the manufacturers website for $15 before you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mondrian

customer_reviews.title: Expensive at first but great product and fits cat collars great
customer_reviews.text: Actually this is a really good way of finding your pet ..especially if u kinda know where they went ...we tracked one of our cats that likes to roam...within about 500 feet it starts to pick up a signal and gives an arrow to show where to kinda go....and shows a percentage the closer u get ....my wife loved it ...holds up to three collars to track and has a range mode to alert u when your pet leaves the area
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and works poorly
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky and hard to use, sadly the return window has closed or I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Danny C.

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This tracker is worth its weight in gold...i needed to track my german shorthair several times and it was spot on! I knew exactly where he was and was able to find him before he got too far....great battery life also!!! Highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't pick up as well as expected, less than 1/2 mile
customer_reviews.author: Lora Jared

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent product. It's not too often I actually buy an electronic product and it performs as expected based on the description but this is one that does that and I really recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: I use the marco polo system to locate my goats
customer_reviews.text: I place the tag on my goats. I need them to come home so they can be milked and to avoid engorgement/mastitis. If they don't come home after browsing in the jungle, I can easily locate them. They also may birth in the jungle and I used to spend hours searching for them and wondering if they died or were hunted/shot. The GPS systems wont' work in the jungle if the tree cover is heavy. I am thoroughly pleased and the customer service is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to use when taking dog off leash, in a private area.  Good for short distances.
customer_reviews.text: This tracker has given me piece of mind in knowing which direction my small but mighty dog has gone. I like taking her off leash, on our own property. I always go out with her but on the occasions where she is after a scent, I know which direction to walk to find her. I also bought her a light up safety vest for nighttime use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have bought before six different trackers for my cat, this one beats all that I have tried. I use it on a daly basis. Finally I have a tracker that delivers its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G

customer_reviews.title: Worked but was hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: Worked but was hard to follow. May have been operator error but returned anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works in Forest Areas.
customer_reviews.text: We like in a mountain area with a lot of trees and hills and sketchy Wi-Fi service. Of everything we have tried, this is the absolute best. Our Mastiff likes to go down to the creek and rub aroubd to the neighbor's property, and we have had no difficulties tracking him.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Rexford

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tracker! Shows direction and percent distance from you.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Hames

customer_reviews.title: worked great for 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 weeks now the tracker is not receiving signal when dog is not far from monitor.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Best tracker ever!
customer_reviews.text: Am thrilled with this product, it has helped me find my Jack Russel every time. Even when she has gone down a hole. and it is nice and compact and does not standout on her collar.
customer_reviews.author: ,Mrs P D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Great for our needs! I have located my 78 lb labradoodle every time I've used this. He has a new habit of wandering off during our hikes. I was concerned based on some reviews about our hilly and rocky terrain, but it has worked great. I have a general idea of the direction he takes and the tracker has helped me find him each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow....I can finally keep up with my beagles. I know where they are at all times. Soft beep when they get out of yard. Customer service is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Carcup8

customer_reviews.title: Works with our cat FANTASTIC!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this product on our cat and it works fantastic. We aren’t spending an hour looking for him any more! Now we find him within minutes and we have our life back. Love this product and we recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nm.stetz

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and easy to use. Highly recommend this device. Live in a city with lots of obstacles but still tracks through walls/cars to find my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and an extra transmitter, charged 2 times and neither transmitter will charge anymore. Tried contacting them and Amazon and no response. Not real happy after dropping $300+. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Displeased
customer_reviews.text: Returned product was not worth it for the amount of money spent on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to know general direction & distance of dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog has wanderlust, and we have a lot of land behind us and she wanders into our neighbors yards. This helps me know which direction she went so I can bring her back over to us if she gets where I don't want her to be. I really like that it's radar and don't need cell service.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Chapuis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than all the others Easy to use, great for tracking your pet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our skittish dog when camping and no gps. Easy to locate, easy to attach to collars and harness. Worth the price of not loosing your fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: andreusfault

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you can see your pet, I have small rolling hills and unit detects pet at about the same time I see him myself.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McColgan

customer_reviews.title: We could not now manage without it.
customer_reviews.text: Used for tracking dog in heavy cover. Only problem it tells where the dog was 5 seconds ago. However you can not loose the dog. The help service is the best I have ever encountered. I emailed the problem and got a correct reply in under 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Old dog

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product!  Anyone know how to order a new collar (pouch collar w Velcro by Marco Polo)?
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Easy to use, and reliable! Q: Anyone know how to order a new collar (the pouch collar with Velcro by Marco Polo)?
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD B SALLES

customer_reviews.title: It does what they say
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, so easy to use and the range it has is way better than i expected
customer_reviews.author: John Collins

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It gets a little confused by my heavily-treed property, but I can track down my cat consistently to bring him in at night.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reiter

customer_reviews.title: No need for a SIM card or account
customer_reviews.text: Bought for tracking a cat who has previously been missing for an extended period. Seems to work fine, although I haven't had enough time to be fully sure.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I need, it’s like having an invisible leash. It’s quite sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not 100%
customer_reviews.text: you have to use it as an tool to help you, and don't trust the arrow
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just feel better knowing if she does I will be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is wearing it. She hasn't run away yet. Just feel better knowing if she does I will be able to find her!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret K. O'malley

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If you live around ANY buildings or hills-- this item is worthless. We have this on our Newfoundland and it never tracks her. Always got No Signal. Monitor-- it should set off an alarm if she goes out of the designated area-- it does not! I have spent numerous hours trying to find her because this thing has failed us almost every time we use it!
customer_reviews.author: Leann S

customer_reviews.title: Poor Choice
customer_reviews.text: It was a poor choice to order this. After six months the collar would no longer charge. It does not have a long range.
customer_reviews.author: Adrasteia

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cat in suburban area
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a cat who tends to roam the area. The tracker was a bit large for the collar, so for a smaller cat it is annoying her. Tracking her in a suburban area was possible but not great. We could find her general position but it was not accurate enough to actually recover her. She finally lost her collar with the tracker on, and we were not able to get hold of it as it is somewhere in a bunch of brushes and the tracker is not accurate enough to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat owner Texas

customer_reviews.title: this is for small dogs. its not for hunting ...
customer_reviews.text: this is for small dogs. its not for hunting dogs either. i think that information should be made available in the product description. i returned all the ones i bought because my partner who wins the squirrel hunting contest up at our farm without a GPS tracker said they were for pets.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Crap crap crap
customer_reviews.text: Crap crap crap. Got this to track my Mavic Pro. Upon opening, handheld device wouldn't turn on or show that it was charging. Returning. Not buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Soper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It actually fit as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It actually fit as described. Sturdy and nice surface. Pliable material, yet very strong. Took paint well and matches factory paint and look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Eureka Technology MARCOPOLO Advanced Pet Monitoring, Tracking and Locating System (for Dogs and Cats 5 lb and Larger)
product_meta.description: The Marco Polo Advanced Pet Tracking system Waterproof and Extremely Rugged is the ideal solution to keep your pets safe while they enjoy all the activities they love. Suitable for pets ranging from the largest dogs down to the smallest dogs and cats having a collar length of 7 inches or more. No internet or cellular access is needed so you can take your pets with you to the most remote locations, knowing that you will be alerted quickly if they wander and easily track them if they become lost. Marco Polo is the perfect solution for protecting your pets while traveling or at home. Extremely rugged, the Advanced Tracking Tag is made to withstand rough terrain and prolonged swimming. The streamlined design keeps the tag out of harm’s way so it is not caught on branches or damaged while playing. Up to two additional tracking tags (sold separately) can be added to the system at any time to allow monitoring and tracking of up to three pets. The tracking tag has an internal, rechargeable battery that lasts up to 6 weeks on a single charge. Since Marco Polo requires no monthly fees it will save you hundreds of dollars over the life of the system when compared to subscription-based systems. When searching for your pet, Marco Polo acts like a personal radar system, scanning every inch of the surrounding area, including the interiors of homes and backyards. The system range is up to 2 miles in open conditions but, as with any 2-way radio system, varies with terrain and obstructions. If your pet is outside the system’s range you can continuously scan hundreds of acres of surrounding area as you drive or walk around. Once within range of your pet the Marco Polo locator will guide you directly to their exact location, within inches if necessary, even if they are injured or hiding – a perfect solution for finding cats that are reluctant to come in at night. Select one of four safety zone ranges for your pet and receive warnings in less than 80 seconds when your pet wanders.
feature_bullets: Works anywhere, totally self-contained, no GPS or cell network required, no monthly service contracts, ideal for traveling with your pets
Simple to setup and use, single button-push to begin searching for lost pets with real-time distance and direction feedback
Includes everything needed for 1-pet, may be expanded to handle up to three pets with purchase of additional tracking tags (sold separately)
Tracking Tags are designed for prolonged swimming, are light enough for cats and rugged enough for the most active dogs
Rechargeable battery on pet’s collar lasts up to 6 weeks while being continuously monitored
